circumstances: Dominic Hart, an elderly retired stage manager originally from Liverpool, went missing from his home on North Lane, Archiestown. Concerns arose when he failed to attend a scheduled child custody-related meeting. His friend, Geraldine Thomas, reported that Dominic had been feeling overwhelmed with family disputes regarding a child custody issue. The police were informed, and a search was initiated, focusing on areas significant to Dominic. Seven days later, Dominic was found at March Road, Buckie. It was believed that Dominic had gone there to seek solace with a friend, Jack Norton, who lived nearby. The authorities concluded that the stress related to the family issues had prompted his sudden departure.
